original: Östlund, Egon Gustaf, förste maskiningenjör, Borås, f. 20/7/89 i Gävle av Gustaf Ö. o. Karin Eklund. G. 1. 17-29 m. Karin Lindberg; 2. 47 m. Karin Svensson. Barn: Olle f. 18, Jan 19, Greta 22. — Avg:ex. fr. ma-skinyrkessk. v. Sthlms tekn. sk. 10. Ritare v. Gävle-Dala Järnv. 06-12 m. uppeh. f. verkst :prakt. o. stud., v. Motala Nya Verkst. A-B 12-16, und:ing. v. Halmstad-Nässjö Järnv. 16-1(8, ma-skining. där 19, förste maskining. 38, maskining. på SJs överg:stat fr. 46, förste m,askin;ing. v. SJ i Borås sed. 47. Led. av Halmstads brandstyr. 24-46, ordf. 31-46, led. av lönend 36-46, ordf. i civ:försv:nd 39-46, led. av arb :lösh :nd 40-46, led. av styr. f. Ensk. järnv. ing:förb. 38-46, rev. där 29-37, sekr. i Ing:fÖren. i Halmstad 19-24 samt 30-36, v. ordf. 36-38 o. ordf. 38-42, sekr. o. int. i Hall. konstfören. 32-44, ordf. 45-46, led. av styr. f. Hum. förb. i Hal|mstad 34-44’. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. sed. 33. RVO.
translated: Östlund, Egon Gustaf, first engineer, Borås, b. 20/7/89 in Gävle to Gustaf Ö. and Karin Eklund. Married 1. 17-29 to Karin Lindberg; 2. 47 to Karin Svensson. Children: Olle b. 18, Jan b. 19, Greta b. 22. Graduated from technical school in Stockholm, class of 10. Worked as a draftsman at Gävle-Dala Railway from 06-12 with breaks for practical and study periods at Motala Nya Verkst. AB from 12-16. Became assistant engineer at Halmstad-Nässjö Railway from 16-18, chief engineer from 38, chief engineer on SJ's national division from 46, and first chief engineer at SJ in Borås since 47. Member of Halmstad Fire Brigade from 24-46, chairman from 31-46, member of the salary council from 36- 46, chairman of the civil defense committee from 39-46, member of the unemployment board from 40-46, member of the board for the Independent Railway Engineers' Association from 38-46, auditor from 29-37, secretary of the Engineering Association in Halmstad from 19-24 and 30-36, vice chairman from 36-38 and chairman from 38-42, secretary and treasurer of the Halland Art Society from 32-44, chairman from 45-46, member of the board for the Halland Humanities Association from 34-44. Member of the Swedish Technical Society since 33. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).

structured.name: Egon Gustaf Östlund
structured.description: Egon Gustaf Östlund was a first engineer from Borås, Sweden.

award.name: Royal Order of Vasa
award.description: Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
